data.text:
Climate Change, Weather and Environment Reports / Data for Aralaguppe

Climate, Environment and Weather data, climate change reports etc. for Aralaguppe is available as professional paid service. You may contact us for further details and sample data.

A brief summary of available data for Aralaguppe is given below:

CategoryResolutionPeriodPrecipitation - hHalf Hourly / 0.1 deg (11 kms) grid2001 - 2024Precipitation - lDaily / 0.25 deg (28 kms) grid1901 - 2024Temperature - hMonthly / 0.5 deg (55 kms) grid1901 - 2023Temperature - lDaily / 1 deg (111 kms) grid1951 - 2024

Social Structure of Aralaguppe

As per available data from the year 2009, 2538 persons live in 610 house holds in the village Aralaguppe. There are 1285 female individuals and 1253 male individuals in the village. Females constitute 50.63% and males constitute 49.37% of the total population.

There are 1708 scheduled castes persons of which 872 are females and 836 are males. Females constitute 51.05% and males constitute 48.95% of the scheduled castes population. Scheduled castes constitute 67.3% of the total population.

There are 59 scheduled tribes persons of which 34 are females and 25 are males. Females constitute 57.63% and males constitute 42.37% of the scheduled tribes population. Scheduled tribes constitute 2.32% of the total population.

Population density of Aralaguppe is 214.33 persons per square kilometer.

Land and Natural Resources in Aralaguppe

Maps, reports and datasets of Aralaguppe on topography, land use land cover(LULC), watershed / hydrological parameters etc. are available as a professional paid service. Please contact us for further details.

Total area of Aralaguppe is 1184.18 Hectares as per the data available for the year 2009.

Total sown/agricultural area is 798.79 ha. About 768.79 ha is un-irrigated area. About 30 ha is irrigated area. About 5 ha is irrigated by tanks/lakes. About 25 ha is irrigated by waterfalls.

About 113.98 ha is in non-agricultural use.

About 14 ha is lying as current fallow area. About 154.34 ha is culturable waste land. About 70.98 ha is lying as fallow land other than current fallows. About 32.09 ha is covered by barren and un-cultivable land.

Schools in Aralaguppe

There is a private pre-primary school in the village Aralaguppe.

There are 5 government primary schools in the village Aralaguppe.

There are 3 government middle schools in the village Aralaguppe.

There is a government secondary school in the village Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government senior secondary schools in the village. However, there is a private senior secondary school in Chikmagalur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

Colleges in Aralaguppe

There are no private or government arts and science degree colleges in the village. However, there is a private arts and science degree college in Chikmaglur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government engineering colleges in the village. However, there is a government engineering college in Chikmagalur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government medical colleges in the village. However, there is a private medical college in Hassan, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government management institutes in the village. However, there is a government management institute in Chikmagalur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government polytechnic institutes in the village. However, there is a private polytechnic institute in Chikmagalur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

Other Educational Facilities in Aralaguppe

There are no private or government vocational training school / ITIs in the village. However, there is a private vocational training school / ITI in Chikmagalur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government non formal training centres in the village. However, there is a private non formal training centre in Chikmagalur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.

There are no private or government differently abled schools in the village. However, there is a private differently abled school in Chikmaglur, which is 5-10 kms away from Aralaguppe.
